comments:
I was in JFace ImageRegistry class, but 2 or 3 versions back.  I selected the constructor for OriginalImageDescriptor (an inner class) and did CTRL+ALT+H ... I received an NPE ... obviously it shouldn't quite have worked since it wasn't the workspace version of the class.
